radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver echotexture is normal, no focal intrahepatic lesion or intrahepatic bile duct dilation. The main portal vein is patent. The gallbladder is filled with numerous mobile stones and a 9-mm immobile neck stone. The gallbladder is not distended, the wall is not thickened, no pericholecystic fluid is seen, mild focal tenderness present. The IVC, pancreas, and aorta are normal, and no ascites is present. The right kidney measures 10.6 cm with no stone or hydronephrosis.
